message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, even at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for it. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm aiming for a higher price, I could meet you halfway at $12,500. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $12,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,800 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
